caption.text:
New @touchdesigner tutorial! This one shows a method for making looping animations using noise. The first in a series of tutorials that look at extracting various loops from noise. Find it on my website (link in bio.)
.
This technique is based on an article by Etienne Jacob (@necessarydisorder ). In the tutorial we recreate one of his Processing sketches in TouchDesigner.
.
Let me know if you have questions, comments, suggestions or corrections. More soon!
.
.
